document_data.name: 101 Garlic Recipes
document_data.author: [[Rab Bitnez]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''101 Garlic Recipes''''' was a [[book|cookbook]] by a [[garlic]]-obsessed [[wizard]] [[Rab Bitnez]] in [[Faerûn]].
document_data.Contents: The book contained one hundred and one recipes of a wide variety of dishes creatively made using its star ingredient—garlic. The recipes included [[The Bitnez Pavlova Extraordinaire!]], [[Rab's Riotously Intense Ice Cream]], and [[Garlic Guy Pie]].
